articles.title: WATCH | Former Minneapolis cop Derek Chauvin convicted of George Floyd's murder - News24
articles.description: Sacked police officer Derek Chauvin was convicted of murder and manslaughter Tuesday in the death of African-American George Floyd in a case that roiled the United States for almost a year, laying bare deep racial divisions.
articles.content:
• A jury has found former Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin guilty of the murder of George Floyd back in 2020.

articles.title: ‘Turning point in American history’: Derek Chauvin found guilty of murder in George Floyd case - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Derek Chauvin, the former police officer who was filmed kneeling on the neck of black man George Floyd last May, has been found guilty of two counts of murder.
articles.content:
This case is a turning point in American history for accountability of law enforcement and sends a clear message we hope is heard clearly in every city and every state.

articles.title: Genome-Wide Data from Stone Age Bears Recovered from Cave Sediments | Genetics, Paleontology - Sci-News.com
articles.description: Scientists have reconstructed the genomes of the extinct giant short-faced bear (Arctodus simus) and the American black bear (Ursus americanus) using environmental DNA fragments from the remote Chiquihuite Cave in Mexico.
